title: AdiIRC v2.7 x64
description:
AdiIRC v2.7 x64

AdiIRC is a free IRC client (Internet Relay Chat) developed by Per Amundsen, if you know mIRC, HexChat, XChat then you know what this is about.

In short, AdiIRC is lightweight, fully portable (despite the fact that it has an Installer, AdiIRC stores all of its configurations within the installed folder, no registry keys are created and it creates only one folder, so whenever you have the need to back it up, just copy the installed folder, and you're good to go, you can run it from a USB Stick if you want to

With an awesome scripting language (ASL or Advanced Scripting Language: It's modeled after the popular mIRC scripting language)if you like to play with it and you're tired of mIRC this is the best you'll get (and you wont regret it).

Currently at version 2.7, this client is constantly being developed and updated, bugs fixed and new features added,
its scripting language (ASL) keeps growing and growing, and now the technical stuff.

Customization: 
Themes, MTS Themes (mIRC themes, some may not work, but most of them do)
Plugins
Scripts/Snippets (some might work, others may not)
Translations (currently there are translation for the following languages Danish/da-DK, Polish/pl-PL, Chinese/zh-CN
Italian/it-IT, Spanish/es-ES, French/fr-FR, German/de-DE, Portuguese/pt-PT, Portuguese/pt-BR, Russian/ru-RU)
Just as a warning, the client might not be fully translated into the presented languages, translations are made by
volunteers, plus, certain strings are nearly impossible to translate, hope you understand

Now Playing: FYI the Now Playing allows you to show others what you are currently playing on your media player, the following Media Players are the ones supported
...Winamp
...Itunes
...MusikCube
...QCDPlayer
...MediaMonkey
...Foobar2000
...XMPlayer
...Spotify
...VLC Media Player
...Media Player Classic
...PotPlayer
...SMPlayer
...MusicBee
...AIMP
...Bomi
...Mpv

Misc:
...Threaded Multiservers
...System Informations
...DCC Chat/File Transfers
...Fullscreen
...Opacity and Transparency
...Background Images
...Full Message Logging
...Easy Message Search
...SSL/TLS/STARTTLS/IPV6 Connections
...IRC logs browser/viewer
...Advanced scripting
...MTS Themes
...Theme packs Icons fonts colors sounds emoticons scripts
...Monitor Panels
...Spellchecker
...Adjustable nick column
...Proxy support
...Emoticons
...Nicklist/Treebar/Windows icons
...Advanced server list
...SASL support
...IRCv3 compatible

AdiIRC requires Microsofts .NET 4.0 Runtime or higher installed, you can download it here (https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17851) or get it from WindowsUpdate. AdiIRC installation will also install it for you.

Last but not least, AdiIRC runs on Linux under Wine 1.5+, Net Framework is also required install it through WineTricks http://winetricks.org/winetricks

Official Website: http://www.adiirc.com
Direct Download: https://www.adiirc.com/download.php
Changelog: https://adiirc.com/changelog.php
AdiIRC Screenshots: https://dev.adiirc.com/boards/6/topics/195?r=207
Translations: https://dev.adiirc.com/projects/adiirc/wiki/Translations
Themes: https://dev.adiirc.com/projects/adiirc/boards/6
